rooms.description: Open-plan space incorporating living area with adjoining dining space. Designed for maximum natural light exposure from east and north facades in accordance to Vastu principles.
Integrated into the open-plan living area with an island worktop. Natural ventilation is provided through large windows facing south and west, following local building norms for kitchen safety.
Connects the living area to the staircase leading to the upper floor. Designed with minimalistic features in line with Brutalist style.
Essential facilities placed adjacent to the living area for ease of access, ensuring compliance with local building codes and Vastu principles by placing utilities in a corner.
Small storage space integrated within the living area for convenience while maintaining the overall open-plan aesthetic.
